text: This as is in perfect alignment w a book this is LAUNCHING 2/12/19! Written (almost 2 years ago now and finally just published) to provoke conversation and teach the value of the polarity of the sexes while at the same time being incredibly educational! #pusillanimous #polarityexpert #masculinityfeminity

Excellent!There is a big difference between MEN and BOYS shown in Gillette. our modern society allow boys to get older without growing up (or maturing). This is perpetuated as many live without role models. Perhaps because boys are without fathers in their home, or they live entitled lives of ease, not learning how to become a capable man. Society is in desperate need of a boundary Re-set! #pusillanimous #polarityexpert #masculinityfeminity
